<!-- <UL>
<H2>User applications can now invoke hypre routines from both C and Fortran 77</H2>
</UL></P>
<P><UL>
integer b, x
</UL><UL>
integer A
</UL><UL>
integer smg_solver
</UL><UL>

</UL><UL>
b = hypre_vector_NewVector(com, grid, stencil)
</UL><UL>
...
</UL><UL>
x = hypre_vector_NewVector(com, grid, stencil)
</UL><UL>
...
</UL><UL>
A = hypre_matrix_NewMatrix(com, grid, stencil)
</UL><UL>
...
</UL><UL>

</UL><UL>
smg_solver = hypre_smg_solver_new()
</UL><UL>
call hypre_smg_solver_SetMaxIter(smg_solver, 10)
</UL><UL>
call hypre_smg_solver_Solve(smg_solver, A, b, x)
</UL><UL>
call hypre_smg_solver_Finalize(smg_solver)</UL></P>
<P><UL>
hypre_vector b, x;
</UL><UL>
hypre_matrix A;
</UL><UL>
hypre_smg_solver smg_solver;
</UL><UL>

</UL><UL>
b = hypre_vector_NewVector(com, grid, stencil);
</UL><UL>
...
</UL><UL>
x = hypre_vector_NewVector(com, grid, stencil);
</UL><UL>
...
</UL><UL>
A = hypre_matrix_NewMatrix(com, grid, stencil);
</UL><UL>
...
</UL><UL>

</UL><UL>
smg_solver = hypre_smg_solver_new();
</UL><UL>
hypre_smg_solver_SetMaxIter(smg_solver, 10);
</UL><UL>
hypre_smg_solver_Solve(smg_solver, &A, &b, &x);
</UL><UL>
hypre_smg_solver_Finalize(smg_solver);</UL></P>
<P><UL>
C Test Code</UL></P>
<P><UL>
Fortran 77 Test Code</UL></P>
<P><UL>
The end user is completely unaware that IDL tools were used</UL></P>
<P>  -->
